response.original_title: Mon: The Man Who Wear Orange
response.overview: The ruthless Confederation is taking control of galaxy after galaxy, and hope is running out across the stars. But when a simple smuggler messes up a delivery, he accidentally sets off a chain of events that could shake the whole system. Now stranded on a forgotten planet, Mon has nothing left but his sharp wit and a bad attitude.
response.tagline: It all went wrong… and somehow, that’s exactly what the galaxy needed
response.title: Mon: The Man Who Wear Orange
